html.author: Author
html.help_using_maplat: This site is built with open source historical map viewer Maplat.
html.help_operation_content:
Move the map by dragging the mouse in case of PC, swiping action with finger in case of smartphone.
Scaling the map can be done with the upper left buttons in case of PC, with pinch in/out actions with two fingers in case of smartphone.
On smartphone, you can rotate the map by twisting with two fingers.
By Using the button at the upper left, you can move to the home position of the map being displayed.
The compass displayed on button indicates the current north direction, and by pressing this button, the rotation state of the map can be returned to the normal position.
html.help_selection_content:
The two sliders with thumbnail like are displayed in the lower left and the lower right of the screen, you can select the map to display with them.
Slide the slider to select the map you want, and click the thumbnail, then the map changed.
The lower left map slider is to choose base maps (accurate maps), the lower right map slider is to choose historical/illustrated maps.
html.help_gps_title: Showing current position on the map
html.help_gps_content:
When you press the button, the GPS function turns on and the user's current location is displayed on the map as .
If you press the button again, the GPS function turns off.
If the user's current location is not on the map being displayed, a message will be displayed and the GPS function will be turned off automatically.
html.help_poi_content:
Pins such as may be displayed on the map, these are where the spot information are provided.
Click or tap the pin to display spot information.
html.help_etc_attr: Button: Various information (such as creator, contributor or license, etc.) of the currently displayed map are displayed.
html.help_share_help: Button: You can share this application to SNS etc.
html.help_etc_border:
Button: Showing map border lines.
You can also switch the map by clicking inside the boundary.
On a PC, select a map with a mouse over and switch the map with a click, on a smartphone, select a map with a click and switch the map with one more click.
html.help_etc_hide_marker:
Button: Toggles the display / hide of markers.
When you press and hold the button, a screen to display / hide for each marker layer is displayed.
html.help_etc_slider:
Slider: Switch the transparency of the displayed map so that the background map can be seen through.
It operates only while displaying the historical/illustrated maps, it does not work when displaying the base maps.

app.out_of_map_area: Showing area is out of map. The area moves to default position.
